# README #
Library for converting to and from BSON

## Build library ##
```bash
make
```

## Build and run sample program ##
```bash
make sample
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=. ./sample
```

* Quick summary
* Version
* [Learn Markdown](https://bitbucket.org/tutorials/markdowndemo)
